title: Tough Day for UAE: Molano’s Puncture Takes Air Out of Pogačar’s Perfect Start to 2025
content:
'Home' team jarred by back luck on opening day of UAE Tour as world champion Pogačar blows out cobwebs in season debut: 'It would have been something beautiful.'

Read the full article at Tough Day for UAE: Molano’s Puncture Takes Air Out of Pogačar’s Perfect Start to 2025 on Velo.
author: sstokes
